## utils.idGenerator namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [genUid()](./blockly.utils.idgenerator.genuid.md) | Generate a random unique ID. |
|  [getNextUniqueId()](./blockly.utils.idgenerator.getnextuniqueid.md) | Generate the next unique element IDs. IDs are compatible with the HTML4 id attribute restrictions: Use only ASCII letters, digits, '\_', '-' and '.'<!-- -->For UUIDs use genUid (below) instead; this ID generator should primarily be used for IDs that end up in the DOM. |
